abstract: From the crowd of Christian conservatives, the scream, "We love you, Herman Cain."
snippet: From the crowd of Christian conservatives, the scream, "We love you, Herman Cain."
lead_paragraph: The top religious conservatives gathered at the Values Voter Summit gave Herman Cain a rousing ovation many times over Friday afternoon as he delivered his stump speech at the annual gathering. The summit stop, at a hotel in Washington, was a detour for Mr. Cain from his book tour, which kicked off this week in New York City.
